'''James''' is the ex-boyfriend of [[Sheila Davis]].

==History==
James met [[Sheila Davis]] online and they started chatting. They dated online for over a year when Sheila had to have a tumor removed, so James decided to come to the hospital to see her. She was shocked to see that instead of the man in the picture, James looked completely different, short and balding. She asked him to leave.

Despite being asked to leave, James stayed at the hospital, hoping she'd give him a chance. However, they argued when he learned that she'd lied about her tumor being life-threatening.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He dated [[Sheila Davis]] online for over a year. However, things quickly ended when they met in person and Sheila learned that he had lied about his appearance and she had lied about how serious her tumor was.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He told Sheila he was 6'2". He is actually much shorter.
